name: Tyom Semonov
title: Frontend Developer
description: Experienced frontend developer based in London.
details:
A passionate web developer with over 15 years of professional experience in building websites and applications for the Web to be used on various devices. Progressively enhanced and built on web standards with best practices.

Curious and always eager to learn and experiment. With attention to detail, code maintainability and performance under different conditions and range of devices. Cross-skilled but focused and an advocate of data-driven, user-centred and accessible design.
